::Battera::

She heard Zardus and turned the CR chamber to keep Vulois in stasis 
lock until Zardus was able to deal with him.  She hopped that Zardus 
would be able reprogram him into being one of the Allience. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I did reply to Valtron, Kinger. I think it was post 17003.
> 
> ::Zardus/DevilDuer::
> 
> Zardus looks at Hot Rod and Cybershark, asserting what they could 
be good 
> for. He finally nods. "Both of you will need quarters," he says, 
remembering 
> that Battera didn't have any as her comm message arrives.
> 
> "I'll be right there," he says into his comm, "Set the CR chamber 
to put him 
> in stasis."
> 
> He looks at HotRod, Cybershark, and Feline, walking off to the 
residential 
> area and motioning for them to follow.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer smiles, watching the pod open. He looks over the femm as 
she 
> emerges, glancing around when she asks her question.
> 
> "You're on past earth," he says, realizing that she probably didn't 
detect 
> him. His hand stays near his gun, DevilDuer ready for battle just 
in case, 
> "What faction are you?"
